title: i am not able to conclude my priority order!!!
content:
As i posted earlier for some suggestions from senior but rn i'm confused! what should be my priority order? 

1.. CS RR; CS EC ; AIML RR; AIML EC or

2.. CS RR; AIML RR; CS EC; AIML EC 



i have already gone through faqs still i'm confused please guide your bro....

comments.body:
It. Is. Not. That. Big. Of. a. Deal.

Prioritize the campus which is more convenient for you

short ans -2
long ans - it depends, they say placement are same but the other factors like fest , and other cultural shit most of them happen in rr .And there is no much difference between aiml and cs take the branch you have atleast some intrest in

I strongly don't recommend picking EC over RR.
If u just miss out on RR by a bit, try for other colleges before considering EC.
Why tho what's the issue with ec
